findings.title: Unprotected approve function
findings.description: The approve function is public and can be called by anyone, potentially leading to unauthorized approvals.

findings.title: Unprotected increaseAllowance function
findings.description: The increaseAllowance function is not protected and can be exploited by attackers.

findings.title: Unprotected decreaseAllowance function
findings.description: N/A

findings.title: Unprotected _approve function
findings.description: The _approve function is declared as private but lacks access modifiers, making it vulnerable to unauthorized access.

findings.title: Unprotected transfer function
findings.description: The contract allows unauthorized users to transfer tokens without proper access control.

findings.title: Unprotected transferFrom function
findings.description: The transferFrom function is unprotected and can be exploited.

findings.title: Unprotected permit function
findings.description: The contract owner may contain the authority to modify the transaction tax. If the transaction tax is increased to more than 49%, the tokens may not be able to be traded.

findings.title: Unprotected burn function
findings.description: No description available

findings.title: Unprotected swap function
findings.description: The swap functions (swapExactTokensForTokens, swapTokensForExactTokens, swapExactETHForTokens, swapTokensForExactETH, swapExactTokensForETH, swapETHForExactTokens) are unprotected and can be called externally without any access control.

findings.title: Unprotected skim function
findings.description: No description provided.

findings.title: Unprotected sync function
findings.description: N/A

findings.title: Unprotected initialize function
findings.description: The contract's initialize function can be called by anyone, potentially leading to unauthorized state changes.

findings.title: Potential reentrancy in removeLiquidityETHSupportingFeeOnTransferTokens
findings.description: The function removeLiquidityETHSupportingFeeOnTransferTokens is vulnerable to potential reentrancy attacks.

findings.title: Potential reentrancy in removeLiquidityETHWithPermitSupportingFeeOnTransferTokens
findings.description: The function removeLiquidityETHWithPermitSupportingFeeOnTransferTokens is vulnerable to potential reentrancy attacks.

findings.title: Potential unauthorized script upgrade
findings.description: N/A

findings.title: Unprotected addLiquidity function
findings.description: N/A

findings.title: Unprotected addLiquidityETH function
findings.description: No description provided

findings.title: Unprotected removeLiquidity function
findings.description: The removeLiquidity function can be exploited by an attacker to drain liquidity from the contract.

findings.title: Unprotected removeLiquidityETH function
findings.description: The removeLiquidityETH function does not have any access control or protection, allowing unauthorized users to remove liquidity.

findings.title: Unprotected removeLiquidityWithPermit function
findings.description: The removeLiquidityWithPermit function is unprotected and can be exploited.

findings.title: Unprotected removeLiquidityETHWithPermit function
findings.description: The removeLiquidityETHWithPermit function is unprotected and can be exploited.
